name: Achar ash
Description: The Achar is a small fern that turns into ash at the end of it's lifecycle. The fern itself has a red tint to it.

name: Arathon
Description: A small plant, resembling a yellow bush. It glimmers slightly and therefore is also known as the crownbush.

name: Arewinia
Description: A bright, multicolored flower known for it's sweet nectar.

name: Aylia bloom
Description: The Aylia bloom is a large, white flower that grows in the dark. It's petals are luminescent and it's stem is black as night. These flowers are rumoured to onyl grow during eclipses.

name: Blackrose
Description: This rose is known for it's danger if not handled properly. It's thorns are especially sharp and emit a potent poison. It's petals are black and it's stem is a dark purple.

name: Blazeroot
Description: A rare root that is gray on the outside, with orange veins inside. Used as a foolproof firestarter, since it creates fire when crushed.

name: Borithen
Description: A bush containing small black berries. Often used as a simple enhancer.

name: Cavefern
Description: A small green fern that grows in dark crevices.

name: Cliff ginger
Description: A long green plant, harvested for it's thick, yellow roots. It grows in high places. It is said to hold benefits for endurance and stamina.

name: Coppergrass
Description: Coppergrass grows on rusted metals, mainly oxidized copper. The grass itself is short and dark green.

name: Crownmoss
Description: A dark green moss wiht blossoming golden flowers. It grows in dark, humid places and is often found amongst old ruins.

name: Deepcap
Description: This shroom usually grows on walls. Poisonous centipides love to reside under the cap.

name: Deepmoss
Description: Moss that grows near crevices and cracks. It's a dark green color.

name: Dragonflower
Description: This flower is rumoured to be left behind whenever a dragon bleeds. It's petals are red and it's stem is a orange gradient.

name: Earendiler
Description: A rose that grows underwater. It's shaft is extremely durable and shines like a diamond.

name: Ecthen
Description: A berry bush that grows where it's warm.

name: Eken leaf bundle
Description: A leaf sold across Evervast. The leaves smell good and are used in saunas.

name: Embercap
Description: An orange mushroom that grows deep in caves. It's tranclucent cap glows in the dark.

name: Eowiner
Description: A large gray flower. The first sign of winter.

name: Firgolfir
Description: A small flower, white like the stars. Boost's one's confidence and charisma. Often used by powerful leaders. Often classified as a drug.

name: Flamevine
Description: This vine is populated by small blossoming light blue flowers. A large contributor to forest fires.

name: Frostbloom
Description: A whiter flowe with a blue gradient. It's petals are cold to the touch.

name: Gahjaras
Description: A common leaf that is gray in color. It is often used among druids and as a simple enhancer.

name: Gravelily
Description: A small lily as black as night, but decorated by a white star. Found among gravesites and battlefields.

name: Grayleaf
Description: A common leaf that is gray in color. It is often used among druids and as a simple enhancer.

name: Greenmint
Description: A small, light green plant. Itâ€™s purpose is unclear.

name: Honeyfungus
Description: The honeyfungus is a yellow mushroom that grows in clusters. A small natural webbing covers the cap.

name: Ironshroom
Description: This mushroom's cap is as hard as iron. It grows near trees or rocks and is sometimes used as armor by small creatures.

name: Jackberry
Description: This berry grows everywhere, no matter the conditions. It is a bright red color.

name: Knaveroot
Description: Knaveroot is deceptively similar to a standard root of a tree. It's true colors are only revealed when it is cut open, sheltering a black sap-like liquid.

name: Lightberry
Description: This berry grows on a small, unintresting bush. It's light often attracts small insects.

name: Longhay
Description: Longhay can grow up to 70cm and resembles standard wheat. It has however, no ear(tip).

name: Luthenen
Description: This flower is visible to only those who the flower deems beautiful. Apparently it is grown from the seed of the fallen greattree.

name: Moonbloom
Description: This light blue flower grows only during the night and quickly withers when exposed to sunlight.

name: Morningflower
Description: A flower that blooms in the morning and closes at night. It is a bright yellow color.

name: Mrtas
Description: A dangeours plant knon for it's mind control abilities. One infected by the plant is hard to detect.

name: Murkmoss
Description: A moss that grow in puddles of water. It has a brown tint.

name: Nehi
Description: A small, sharp fern. Used in prominetly in Amalran cusine.

name: Nightshade
Description: A dark purple plant that blooms in the dark. Small, white beads grow on the plant, which are toxic and emit a white light.

name: Rimeshroom
Description: A deep blue mushroom that grows near rivers.

name: Roadrose
Description: Found near roads. This rose's petals have a brown tint to it.

name: Sandroot
Description: Found among sand dunes, this root is a light brown color.

name: Serpent-tail
Description: A dark green herb that grows near ditches. The plant has sharp edges which can wound you if you aren't careful.

name: Shadowstalk
Description: A transparent shadowy plant. It's leaves are purple.

name: Spellshroom
Description: A large mushroom containing a dark, sticky liquid.

name: Starmoss
Description: This moss is a black color with small, glowing white dots, resembling the night sky.

name: Strangeroot
Description: This root is a dark purple color and has a strange, sweet smell.

name: Sunbloom
Description: This small flower always faces the sun. It's petals are yellow and it's stem is a light green.

name: Thornroot
Description: A root covered in sharp thorns. It grows among tall trees.

name: Thundergrass
Description: A tall, blue grass that has a shimmering glow. It's said that this grass grows where lighting strikes.

name: Trollbark sap
Description: Trollbark is a hefty tree, growing up to a meter in diameter. It also has a strange property that causes the tree to regenerate extremely fast.

name: Turam
Description: A gray rose that grows almost exclusively in Heltzenhold.

name: Warrior's weed
Description: This weed grows in patches and is often in high demand during wars.

name: Waterlily
Description: This flower grows in small ponds or lakes. It's petals are white and it's stem is green.
